T02D1501:251b-0: @251b * // bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D1501:251b-2: # // bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1501:251b-3: re zhig dang por lha mo rnams kyis cang te'u'i
T02D1501:251b-4: sgras bskul pa sngon du 'gro bsams nas langs te
T02D1501:251b-5: dpa' po dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi zhabs
T02D1501:251b-6: la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gus pas phyag
T02D1501:251b-7: 'tshal lo zhes brjod de phyag 'tshal bar bya'o //
T02D1501:251b-8: de nas gdong la sogs pa bkrus te /
T02D1501:251b-9: sgra la sogs dang bral ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas /
T02D1501:251b-10: gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung brtson par bya ste /
T02D1501:251b-11: g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D1501:251b-12: gnod mdzes kyi sngags aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1501:251b-13: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1501:251b-14: aom grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1501:251b-15: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga p'a na badzra r'a dza h'um dza h'um phat /
T02D1501:251b-16: ces brjod de shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1501:251b-17: da nas rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1501:251b-18: padma dum bu gcig pa'i nang du bi mu shu
T02D1501:251b-19: ma ram / go ku da ha na /
T02D1501:251b-20: zhes bya ba stobs dang bcas pa'i bdud rtsi bltas
T02D1501:251b-21: la h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar pos sbyang
T02D1501:251b-22: bar bya'o // yi ge aa sa ni sad par byas la /
T02D1501:251b-23: aom gyis 'bar zhing gsal bar byas nas /
T02D1501:251b-24: rang gi lce'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D1501:251b-25: sarbba ta th'a ga ta bighnam bi ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1501:251b-26: zhes bya bas btung bar bya zhing de nyid kyis lus la bskus nas ;
T02D1501:251b-27: gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang mi dga' ba dang /
T02D1501:251b-28: 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa'i gnyen por gyur pa byams pa dang /
T02D1501:251b-32: de ltar gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
T02D1501:251b-33: rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las byung ba'i
T02D1501:251b-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um
T02D1501:251b-35: mthing shun lta bu'i rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1501:251b-36: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis lus dang tshor ba
T02D1501:251b-37: dang sems dang chos dag stong pa nyid du bsams
T02D1501:252a-0: nas / mdun du bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa dang @252a * //
T02D1501:252a-1: sangs rgyas thams cad dang bla ma blta bar bya'o //
T02D1501:252a-2: de nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yid kyis
T02D1501:252a-3: byas la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa brjod
T02D1501:252a-4: par bya'o // de'i 'og tu rgyu ba dang mi
T02D1501:252a-5: rgyu bar rang gi lus dang lhan cig stong par
T02D1501:252a-6: par bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // aom sh'u n+ya
T02D1501:252a-7: t'a dznya na badzra sv'a bha ba a'atma ko& ham
T02D1501:252a-8: par bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // // de nas
T02D1501:252a-9: sems gcig pu smon pa dang 'jug pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1501:252a-10: can bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa rnam pa sna
T02D1501:252a-11: tshogs su snang ba'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis so
T02D1501:252a-12: par bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // // // bgegs
T02D1501:252a-13: 'byung bar dgos na yi ge aom las byung ba'i
T02D1501:252a-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D1501:252a-15: h'um las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsgoms la
T02D1501:252a-16: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bgegs thal bar 'gyur
T02D1501:252a-17: bar bsams te rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
T02D1501:252a-19: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyis gzhir byin gyis brlab pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1501:252a-20: rdo rje'i ra ba der chos 'byung gi phyag rgya
T02D1501:252a-21: chen po bsgom zhing de'i nang du 'jug pa'i sems
T02D1501:252a-23: 'og tu yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1501:252a-24: sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu rdo rje gnyis kyis
T02D1501:252a-25: mtshan pa dang / de'i steng du ram yongs su
T02D1501:252a-26: gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum rdo rje
T02D1501:252a-27: mtshan pa dang / mtshan pa dang / de'i steng
T02D1501:252a-28: du bam las gyur pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po
T02D1501:252a-29: zlum po rdo rjes mtshan pa dang /
T02D1501:252a-30: de'i steng du lam las gyur pa'i dbang chen gyi
T02D1501:252a-31: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi kha dog ser po rdo rje
T02D1501:252a-33: de'i stang du yi ge sum yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1501:252a-34: ri rab rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gru
T02D1501:252a-35: bzhi pa lcog brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang
T02D1501:252a-36: / de'i steng du h'um las gyur pa'i sna tshogs
T02D1501:252a-37: rdo rje ste ri rab dang 'byung ba bzhi yongs
T02D1501:252a-38: su gyur pa las rdo rjer gyur pa'i sa'i char
T02D1501:252a-39: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su rin po che thams
T02D1501:252a-40: cad kyi gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi la sogs par
T02D1501:252a-41: / blta bar bya'o // de'i nang du 'khor lo
T02D1501:252a-42: gsum dang dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa kha
T02D1501:252a-43: dog sna tshogs pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1501:252a-44: lte ba'i steng du dus mtshan ma dang 'jigs byed chen po blta'o //
T02D1501:252a-45: da'i steng du a'a li k'a li las byung ba'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02D1501:252a-46: de'i steng du yi ge h'um las byung ba'i rdo
T02D1501:252b-0: rje @252b dmar po yi ge h'um gi mgon dang
T02D1501:252b-1: bcas pa 'od 'phro pa'i rang bzhin can de yongs
T02D1501:252b-2: su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D1501:252b-3: dpa' ston ka'i zla ba'i sprin lta bu phyag drug
T02D1501:252b-5: ral pa'i cod pan gyis sbras pa //
T02D1501:252b-6: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes /
T02D1501:252b-7: thod pa'i phreng ba dag gis brgyan //
T02D1501:252b-8: zhal dkar sngo dang dmar ba dang //
T02D1501:252b-9: zhal ni cung zad rnam bzhad pa //
T02D1501:252b-10: rdo rje dril bu snyoms par zhugs //
T02D1501:252b-11: sgeg pa'i ros ni 'phyo mdzad pa //
T02D1501:252b-12: sgeg pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D1501:252b-13: mchu yis btung pa'i dregs pa dgyes //
T02D1501:252b-14: phyag rgya mchod pa kha tv'am ga / mi mgo dang ni rtse gsum 'chang //
T02D1501:252b-15: lha mo de mdog phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1501:252b-16: gri gug dang ni lhung bzed bsnams //
T02D1501:252b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1501:252b-18: bde ba chen po'i gnas na bzhugs //
T02D1501:252b-19: de nas smon pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje
T02D1501:252b-20: sems dpa'i zhal du zhugs par rnam par bsams la
T02D1501:252b-21: byang chub kyi sems 'dod chags kyi mes zhu pa'i
T02D1501:252b-23: de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
T02D1501:252b-24: sprul pa'i lha mos yongs su bskul bas yi ge
T02D1501:252b-25: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje yi ge h'um gi
T02D1501:252b-26: mgon dang bcas pa 'od zer gyi tshogs rab tu
T02D1501:252b-27: 'phro ba / sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin
T02D1501:252b-28: du gyur pa la bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i
T02D1501:252b-29: gzugs can sku la rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa
T02D1501:252b-31: pa khro bo sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs
T02D1501:252b-32: 'phro ba / / zhal bzhi pa / phyag bcu
T02D1501:252b-33: gnyis pa g-yas brkyang pa'i bzhugs pas dus mtshan gnon
T02D1501:252b-34: pa rtsa ba'i zhal sngo bsangs /
T02D1501:252b-36: rgyab padma r'a ga ltar dmar ba /
T02D1501:252b-37: g-yas ljang gu mche ba dang bcas pas 'jigs par mdzad pa smin ma ser ba /
T02D1501:252b-38: dbu skra gyen du brdzes la 'bar ba /
T02D1501:252b-39: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can zla ba byed
T02D1501:252b-40: pa'i thod can sna tshogs rdo rje dbu rgyan gyis
T02D1501:252b-41: gnon pa / spyan bcu gnyis pa /
T02D1501:252b-47: mchod phyir thogs dang thal bas nye bar spras pa
T02D1501:252b-48: stag gi sham thabs can mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng
T02D1501:252b-49: ba 'phyang ba rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'i
T02D1501:253a-1: phyag gzhan gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa /
T02D1501:253a-6: g-yon na tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang /
T02D1501:253a-9: ka p'a la bsnams pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1501:253a-10: phag mo zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1501:253a-13: sku mdog dmar mo dum bus brgyan pa'i ske rags
T02D1501:253a-14: can byin pa gnyis kyis yang dag par 'khril ba
T02D1501:253a-15: / bde ba chen po'i gnas na bzhugs pa phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa /
T02D1501:253a-16: bdud sdig to can la sogs pa'i khrag gis bkang pa'i ka p'a la bsnams pa /
T02D1501:253a-17: phyag gcig na gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D1501:253a-18: yan lag phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1501:253a-19: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin no //
T02D1501:253a-20: padma'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1501:253a-23: gzugs can ma ni go rims bzhin du sngon po dang /
T02D1501:253a-29: ro'i gdan la g-yon brkyang pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1501:253a-33: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1501:253a-34: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba /
T02D1501:253a-35: gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i skra rags can /
T02D1501:253a-36: phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba ste lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1501:253a-37: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni yid 'ong ma'o //
T02D1501:253a-38: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o //
T02D1501:253a-39: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o //
T02D1501:253a-40: mtshams su ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i snod bzhi'o //
T02D1501:253a-41: rnam par dag pa ni rnam par thar pa bzhi ste /
T02D1501:253a-45: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1501:253a-46: dang po thugs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa kha dog sngon po rdo rje dra bas brgyan pa /
T02D1501:253a-47: shar dang lus kyi dkyil 'khor mgo po pull'i ra
T02D1501:253a-48: m'a la ya la thod pa'i dum bu can dang
T02D1501:253b-0: / rab gtum mo ste @253b 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T02D1501:253b-1: sen mo dang so ni thod pa'i dum pu can no //
T02D1501:253b-2: byang dang spyi gtsug dz'a landha ra la ni keng
T02D1501:253b-3: ru sa chen po dang gtum pa'i mig can ma
T02D1501:253b-4: ste brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T02D1501:253b-5: skra dang spu ni keng rus chen mo'o //
T02D1501:253b-6: nub dang rna ba g-yas pa aoo dya na la
T02D1501:253b-7: keng rus dad 'od ldan ma ste dpyod pa'i rdzu
T02D1501:253b-9: pags pa dang dri ma la ni keng rus so //
T02D1501:253b-10: lho dang mgo bo'i rgyab aarbu da la ni mche
T02D1501:253b-11: ba gcig pa dang sna che na mo ste sems
T02D1501:253b-13: shal ni mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1501:253b-14: gnas de bzhi ni sa rab tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1501:253b-15: me'i phyogs dang rna ba g-yon pa go d'a ba
T02D1501:253b-16: ri'i la ni chang dgra dang brtan pa'i blo can
T02D1501:253b-17: ma ste dad pa'i dbang pa'o //
T02D1501:253b-18: rtsa rgyus ni chang dgra ma'o //
T02D1501:253b-19: bden bral gyi phyogs dang smin ma'i dbus su r'a
T02D1501:253b-20: me shva ra la ni 'od dpag med dang mi'u
T02D1501:253b-21: thung ma ste brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1501:253b-22: rus pa la ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1501:253b-23: rlung gi phyogs dang mig de b'i ko t'i la
T02D1501:253b-24: rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste
T02D1501:253b-26: mkhal ma la ni rdo rje'i 'dod do //
T02D1501:253b-27: dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang phrag pa gnyis m'a la
T02D1501:253b-28: ba la ni rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ma
T02D1501:253b-29: ste ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
T02D1501:253b-30: snying rje ni rdo rje'i sku'o //
T02D1501:253b-31: nye ba'i gnas te sa dri ma med pa'o //
T02D1501:253b-32: thugs kyi 'khor lo ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o //
T02D1501:253b-33: gsung gi 'khor lo dmar po padma'i phreng bas brgyan
T02D1501:253b-34: pa'i shar gyi rtsibs dang mchan khung k'a ma r'u
T02D1501:253b-35: pa la ni myu gu can dang sa srung ma
T02D1501:253b-36: ste / shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1501:253b-37: mig ni myu gu can no //
T02D1501:253b-38: byang dang nu ma ao ta la ni rdo rje
T02D1501:253b-39: ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste dad
T02D1501:253b-40: pa'i stobs so // mkhris pa la ni rdo rje ral pa can no //
T02D1501:253b-41: zhing ste sa 'od byed pa can no //
T02D1501:253b-42: nub dang lte ba tri sha kun la ni dpa'
T02D1501:253b-43: bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma ste
T02D1501:253b-45: glo ba la ni dpa' bo chen po'o //
T02D1501:253b-46: lho dang sna'i dbang po ko sa la la ni
T02D1501:253b-47: rdo rje h'um mdzad dang chang 'thung ma ste dran
T02D1501:253b-48: pa'i stobs so // rgyu ma ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02D1501:253b-49: nye ba'i zhing stes 'od 'phro ba can no //
T02D1501:254a-0: me'i phyogs dang kha ka lingga la ni rab tu bzang @254a * //
T02D1501:254a-1: po dang lha mo sngo bsangs ma ste ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs so //
T02D1501:254a-2: gnye ma ni rab tu bzang po'o //
T02D1501:254a-3: bden bral gyi phyogs dang mgrin pa lam pa ka
T02D1501:254a-4: la ni rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang
T02D1501:254a-5: mo ste shes rab kyi stobs so //
T02D1501:254a-6: lto ba ni rdo rje bzang po'o //
T02D1501:254a-7: tshando ha ste sa shin tu sbyang dka' ba'o //
T02D1501:254a-8: rlung gi phyogs dang snying ga k'anytsi la ni 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma'o //
T02D1501:254a-9: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D1501:254a-10: lgang pa ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o //
T02D1501:254a-11: dpang ldan gyi phyogs dang mdoms hi m'a la ya
T02D1501:254a-12: ni mig mi bzang dang bya gtor ma ste brtson
T02D1501:254a-13: 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go ;
T02D1501:254a-14: / mdoms bar ni mig mi bzang ngo //
T02D1501:254a-15: nye ba'i tshando ha ste sa mngon du gyur pa'o //
T02D1501:254a-17: sku'i 'khor lo dkar po 'khor lo'i phreng bas brgyan
T02D1501:254a-18: pa'i shar gyi rtsibs dang mtshan ma pre ta p'u
T02D1501:254a-19: ri la stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can
T02D1501:254a-20: ma ste dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan
T02D1501:254a-21: lag go // bad kan ni stobs po che'o //
T02D1501:254a-22: byang dang bshang lam gri ha de ma t'a ral
T02D1501:254a-23: rin chen rdo rje dang khanda ro h'a ste shin
T02D1501:254a-24: tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
T02D1501:254a-25: go // rnag la ni rdo rje rin chen no //
T02D1501:254a-26: 'dus pa can te sa ring du song ba'o //
T02D1501:254a-27: nub dang brlab gnyis soo r'ashta la rta mgrin dang
T02D1501:254a-28: shoondi n'i ste chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag
T02D1501:254a-29: byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D1501:254a-31: lho dang byin pa gnyis su warna dv'i pa la
T02D1501:254a-32: nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma
T02D1501:254a-33: ste dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
T02D1501:254a-34: go // rdul ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D1501:254a-35: nye ba'i 'dus pa can te sa mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D1501:254a-36: me'i phyogs dang rkang pa'i sor mon gar la dpal
T02D1501:254a-37: he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo ste btang
T02D1501:254a-38: snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D1501:254a-39: tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1501:254a-40: bden bral gyi phyogs dang rkang pa'i bol sindhu la
T02D1501:254a-41: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste
T02D1501:254a-43: mchi ma ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1501:254a-44: dur khrod de sa legs pa'i blo gros so //
T02D1501:254a-45: rlung gi phyogs dang mthe bong ma ru la rnam
T02D1501:254a-46: par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma ste yang
T02D1501:254a-48: mchil ma ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1501:254a-49: dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang pus mo gnyis ku lu
T02D1501:254b-0: t'ar @254b rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen
T02D1501:254b-1: mo ste yang dag pa'i ngag go //
T02D1501:254b-2: snabs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1501:254b-3: nye ba'i dur khrod de sa chos kyi sprin no //
T02D1501:254b-5: thugs kyi 'khor lo sku mdog nag po /
T02D1501:254b-6: gsung gi 'khor lo sku mdog dmar po /
T02D1501:254b-7: sku'i 'khor lo sku mdog dkar po /
T02D1501:254b-8: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dpa' bo zhal
T02D1501:254b-9: gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dril bus snyoms par
T02D1501:254b-10: zhugs pa g-yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa /
T02D1501:254b-11: ral pa'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs can phyag rgya lnga 'chang pa'o //
T02D1501:254b-12: rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis
T02D1501:254b-13: zhal gcig pa ka p'a la dang gdug pa la
T02D1501:254b-14: ; sdigs mdzub gri gug bsnams pas 'khyud //
T02D1501:254b-15: spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can ma //
T02D1501:254b-16: skra grol bas ni rnam par spros //
T02D1501:254b-17: gnyis med sbyor bas snyoms par zhugs //
T02D1501:254b-18: nam mkha'i ges man bas pa la gzhol //
T02D1501:254b-19: lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba //
T02D1501:254b-20: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o ;
T02D1501:254b-21: / shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i sgo rnams la khra gdong ma dang /
T02D1501:254b-25: me'i phyogs dang bden bral gyi phyogs dang rlung gi
T02D1501:254b-26: phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi phyogs rnams la gshin rje
T02D1501:254b-27: brtan ma dang / gshin rje pho nya ma dang /
T02D1501:254b-28: gshin rje mche ba ma dang /
T02D1501:254b-31: khva gdong la sogs la sogs dbye //
T02D1501:254b-32: de bzhin mtshams gnas lha mo ni //
T02D1501:254b-34: yi dags gdan ni 'jigs byed po //
T02D1501:254b-35: sems can don mdzad pa la brtson //
T02D1501:254b-36: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dpral ba la rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1501:254b-37: lus kyi dkyil 'khor la lag pa g-yon pa'i rtse
T02D1501:254b-38: mo la khra gdong ma ste yang dag pa'i las
T02D1501:254b-39: kyi mtha'o // mkhrig ma la ni 'ug gdong ma ste yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
T02D1501:254b-40: lag pa g-yas pa'i rtse mo la ni khyi'i gdong ma ste yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
T02D1501:254b-41: mkhrig ma la ni phag gdong ma ste yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
T02D1501:254b-42: rkang pa g-yas pa'i rtse mo la ni gshin rje
T02D1501:254b-43: brtan ma ste dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
T02D1501:254b-44: skyes pa'i dang tshul can no //
T02D1501:255a-0: rkang pa g-yon pa'i rtse mo la ni gshin rje pho nya ma ste @255a * //
T02D1501:255a-1: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par bsrung pa'o //
T02D1501:255a-2: rkang pa g-yas pa'i long mo la ni gshin rje
T02D1501:255a-3: mche ba ma ste mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa
T02D1501:255a-4: rnams sbong pa yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o
T02D1501:255a-5: // rkang pa g-yon pa'i long mo la ni gshin
T02D1501:255a-6: rje 'joms pa ste mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes
T02D1501:255a-7: pa rnams kun nas mi skye bar byed pa'o //
T02D1501:255a-8: snying ge'i padma'i lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das thig le'i gzugs can no //
T02D1501:255a-9: phyogs kyi padma'i 'dab ma la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1501:255a-10: lte ba'i padma la ni rdo rje phag mo phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1501:255a-11: de ltar phyi dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1501:255a-12: da ni phung po la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1501:255a-13: gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1501:255a-14: tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1501:255a-15: 'du shes kyi phung po padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1501:255a-16: 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D1501:255a-17: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1501:255a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1501:255a-19: mig la ni gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1501:255a-20: rna ba la ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1501:255a-21: sna la ni phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02D1501:255a-22: kha la ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o //
T02D1501:255a-23: lus la ni ser sna rdo rje'o //
T02D1501:255a-24: skye mched thams cad la ni dpal he ru ka'i dbang phyug go //
T02D1501:255a-25: sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o //
T02D1501:255a-26: chu'i khams ni gsod byed ma'o //
T02D1501:255a-28: rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1501:255a-29: nam mkha'i khams la ni rnal 'byor ma'i dra ba
T02D1501:255a-30: ma ste de ltar phung po dang khams dang skye
T02D1501:255a-31: mched dag lha lha nyid kyi nga rgyal bskyed par
T02D1501:255a-32: bya'o // de nas mgo bo la yi ge aom gyis sku byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1501:255a-33: lkog ma la ni yi ge a'a: sa gsung byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1501:255a-34: snying ga la ni yi ge h'um gis thugs byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1501:255a-35: snying ga'i dbus su yi ge h'um gis ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab po//
T02D1501:255a-36: de dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsam mo //
T02D1501:255a-37: aom sarbba b'a ra yo gi n'i k'a ya b'a
T02D1501:255a-38: ka tsi tta badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tam ko&
T02D1501:255a-40: de nas ye shes sems dpa' las spros pa'i 'od
T02D1501:255a-41: zer gyi lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan
T02D1501:255a-42: drangs la mdun du bzhag ste yang dag par mchod
T02D1501:255b-0: @255b nas ; dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la bcug cing myur du ro gcig par bya'o //
T02D1501:255b-1: aom yog shuddha:sarbba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1501:255b-2: aom badzra shuddha:sarbba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02D1501:255b-5: mgo bo la na ma hi rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1501:255b-6: spyi gtsug la sv'a h'a hu padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1501:255b-7: phrag pa gnyis la boo sha ta he he ru ka'o //
T02D1501:255b-8: mig la h'um h'um ho rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1501:255b-9: yan lag thams cad la phat ham rta mchog ste go cha'o //
T02D1501:255b-10: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i go cha'o //
T02D1501:255b-11: lte ba la aom bam rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1501:255b-12: snying ga la ham yam thun mtshams ma'o //
T02D1501:255b-13: kha la hrim mom rmongs byed ma'o //
T02D1501:255b-14: mgo bo la hrem hrim skyong byed ma'o //
T02D1501:255b-15: spyi gtsug la h'um h'um skrag byed ma'o //
T02D1501:255b-16: yan lag thams cad la phat phat gtum mo ste go cha'o //
T02D1501:255b-17: rnal 'byor ma thams cad la nyid kyis dgod par bya'o //
T02D1501:255b-18: mdzub mo gnyis mdung gung mo sbyar //
T02D1501:255b-19: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por sbyar //
T02D1501:255b-20: de ni dpral ba'i dbus bzhag nas //
T02D1501:255b-21: gcu zhing bskor bas bskyod par bya //
T02D1501:255b-22: rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta //
T02D1501:255b-23: kha nas yi ge pheem sgrogs shing //
T02D1501:255b-24: phyogs bcu la sogs khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1501:255b-25: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug / de nas
T02D1501:255b-26: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa nam mkha'i
T02D1501:255b-27: dkyil khengs pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma phyag
T02D1501:255b-28: na ye shes kyi bum pa bsnams pas glu dang
T02D1501:255b-29: gar dang bcas pa'i mchod pas bdag nyid dbang bskur
T02D1501:255b-31: aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D1501:255b-32: de nas rang gi rigs cod pan du gyur to //
T02D1501:255b-33: de nas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma de dag
T02D1501:255b-34: thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi lcags kyus zhal
T02D1501:255b-35: du zhugs nas lha mo'i padma'i dkyil du byang chub
T02D1501:255b-36: kyi sems kyi gzugs su rab tu spro bar bya'o
T02D1501:255b-37: // de las byung ba'i lha mo rnams kyis dam
T02D1501:255b-38: tshig gi 'khor lo mchod de la'i bstod pa'i mchod
T02D1501:255b-39: pas bstod cing gong du bstan pa'i rim pas bdud
T02D1501:255b-41: lus ngag yid kyi dam tshig gi / sems ni sems kyis legs mtshon pa //
T02D1501:255b-42: kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni //
T02D1501:255b-43: bsgom dang ldan pa'i bzlas pa bya //
T02D1501:255b-44: dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis //
T02D1501:256a-2: h'a sv'a ra ba sham la dzva n'i ki d'a
T02D1501:256a-3: ta pha h'um h'um kam ru du he he dzra
T02D1501:256a-4: ba shr'i aom / ta pha h'um h'um ha ha:hr'i aom //
T02D1501:256a-5: mgo bo'i lugs las bzlog pa'i snying pa'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1501:256a-6: ta pha h'um h'um ye n'i tsa ro bee dzra ba aom //
T02D1501:256a-7: h'a sv'a ta pha h'um h'um ye n'i rnna wa
T02D1501:256a-8: dza ba ye n'i ki dd'a ddha bu rbba sa
T02D1501:256a-9: aom / lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1501:256a-10: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ni rab
T02D1501:256a-11: gi ming gi yi ge aom dang h'um gi bar
T02D1501:256a-12: du chud pa'i yi ge h'um dang phat kyi mtha'
T02D1501:256a-14: dpa' bo rnams kyi ni ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i de kho na bzhin du bzlas so //
T02D1501:256a-15: bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni //
T02D1501:256a-16: zla ba'i btung mchog btung bar bya //
T02D1501:256a-17: chos rnams kun gyi dngos mnyam nyid //
T02D1501:256a-18: dam tshig mchog phyir mnyam nyid do //
T02D1501:256a-19: chos rnams bdag med lam du ni //
T02D1501:256a-20: dkyil 'khor mchog ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1501:256a-21: shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor //
T02D1501:256a-22: rnal 'byor ngal bas ngal sos bya //
T02D1501:256a-23: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
T02D1501:256a-24: de la re kh'a nges par sbyar //
T02D1501:256a-25: gyen du sbar ba'i tshul dag gis //
T02D1501:256a-27: khu ba'i gzugs kyi bdud rtsi ni //
T02D1501:256a-29: snang med go 'phang la gnas nas //
T02D1501:256a-30: snang med mnyam pa nyid la brten //
T02D1501:256a-31: chos rnams spyod pa med / chos rnams chos nyid dag kyang med //
T02D1501:256a-33: ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med //
T02D1501:256a-34: de ltar de nyid gnas dag na //
T02D1501:256a-35: ye shes mig ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1501:256a-36: langs pa'i dus kyi tshe na ni //
T02D1501:256a-37: cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin ;
T02D1501:256a-38: / shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1501:256a-39: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1501:256a-40: ru ni bkod pa dag dang bral //
T02D1501:256a-41: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1501:256a-42: rnal 'byor sems la ngal bos bya'i //
T02D1501:256a-43: mya ngan 'das nyid mi bsten to //
T02D1501:256a-45: dpal ldan he ru ka la sogs ;
T02D1501:256a-46: / lha yi rnal 'byor ma dag gis //
T02D1501:256a-47: lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs //
T02D1501:256a-48: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan pa dan dang //
T02D1501:256a-49: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D1501:256a-50: glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1501:256a-52: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
T02D1501:256b-0: dpal @256b bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrub thabs rdo rje
T02D1501:256b-1: slob dpon chen po dpal nyin mo mdzad kyis mdzad
T02D1501:256b-3: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i su bh'u ti sh'anti dang /
T02D1501:256b-4: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i
